profileAlternative.name: Tom Catling
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist at the Competition and Markets Authority
profileAlternative.summary: I am a data scientist with a strong background in Python across a variety of industries. Most of my work has focussed on analysis and simulation of complex systems, including railway networks, knitting machines and x-ray telescopes. I enjoy writing clean, deployable code to analyse these things and communicate the results effectively.

aboutAlternative.text: I am a data scientist with a strong background in Python across a variety of industries. Most of my work has focussed on analysis and simulation of complex systems, including railway networks, knitting machines and x-ray telescopes. I enjoy writing clean, deployable code to analyse these things and communicate the results effectively.

positions.title: Data Scientist
positions.description: I am a data scientist in the CMAs new Data, Technology and Analytics (DaTA) unit. We aim to facilitate and expand the traditional capabilities of the CMA while providing insight into emerging markets centred around data and technology.

positions.title: Resonate
positions.description: Resonate is building the UKs first fully-integrated rail traffic management system (Luminate). My work as a data scientist focusses on simulation and forecasting of train movements across the Great Western Railway, and analysis of the benefits derived from using our traffic management system in this context....

educations.title: The University of Edinburgh
educations.degree: Master of Physics with Honours Astrophysics, First Class

items: Worshipful Company of Scientific Instrument Makers
Phase measuring deflectometry for thin actuated mirrors
